title: Development of Learner-Centered Instructional Design Model for Online Science Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced expertise in scientific fields and basic online learning literacy
context.additional_context: Design of customized online learning environments for science field professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design self-directed learning strategies in an online environment to achieve a completion rate of 80% or higher.
Learners can perform peer feedback activities at least once a week using LMS-based collaborative tools.
Learners can evaluate their ability to design personalized learning pathways using individual devices.
Learners can achieve a level 2 or higher on a three-tier evaluation scale for applying scientific knowledge through formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
